name: Robin K Philip
about_me: Highly motivated Machine Learning Engineer specializing in Computer Vision and Document Understanding, with hands-on experience in OCR and multimodal models. Proficient in Python and familiar with OCR libraries like PaddlePaddle OCR and Tesseract. Eager to apply expertise in developing and scaling AI solutions within the healthcare domain. Committed to collaborative problem-solving and continuous learning to drive impactful results.

achievements: Developed sales prediction models using Python, providing actionable insights for business decision-making.
Built a student CRM system using Django, demonstrating the ability to create impactful technology solutions.
Hands-on experience with OCR and computer vision based document extraction tasks.
Experience with transformer based vision models and multi-modal models.
Experience integrating OCR and layout detection into end-to-end document processing pipelines.

skills: OCR (PaddlePaddle OCR, Tesseract, Adobe PDF Library)
